Name: Unclear Requirements
Description: Ambiguous or incomplete user stories and requirements

Name: Changing Priorities
Description: Frequent changes in project priorities or scope

Name: Tight Deadlines
Description: Sprint goals or release dates that are perceived as unrealistic

Name: Overcommitment
Description: Taking on more work than can be realistically completed in a sprint

Name: Technical Debt
Description: Accumulation of technical debt leading to increased complexity and maintenance

Name: Communication Issues
Description: Poor communication within the team or with stakeholders

Name: Lack of Resources
Description: Insufficient tools

Name: High Workload
Description: Consistently high levels of work without adequate breaks or downtime

Name: Performance Pressure
Description: Pressure to meet performance metrics or key performance indicators (KPIs)

Name: Role Ambiguity
Description: Unclear roles and responsibilities within the Scrum team

Name: Interruptions
Description: Frequent interruptions or context switching due to multitasking

Name: Lack of Autonomy
Description: Limited decision-making authority or control over work processes

Name: Conflict within Team
Description: Personal or professional conflicts among team members

Name: Unrealistic Expectations
Description: Expectations that are not aligned with the team's capabilities or resources

Name: Inadequate Training
Description: Lack of necessary skills or knowledge to perform tasks effectively

Name: Burnout
Description: Risk of burnout due to prolonged stress and overwork

Name: Lack of Recognition
Description: Insufficient recognition or feedback for accomplishments

Name: Unpredictable Workload
Description: Variability in workload that makes planning difficult

Name: Remote Work Challenges
Description: Challenges associated with remote work
AffectedEntities: such as isolation or communication difficulties

Name: Dependency on External Teams
Description: Reliance on external teams or vendors that may cause delays or issues
